Slider1.feedback: Cursor is at least a 2x improvement over Copilot.It's amazing having an AI pair programmer, and is an incredible accelerator for me and my team.
Slider1.name: Ben Bernad

Slider1.feedback: Cursor is so good, and literally gets better/more feature-rich every couple of weeks.
Slider1.name: Morgan McGuire

Slider1.feedback: The Cursor tab completion while coding is occasionally so magic it defies reality - about ~25% of the time it is anticipating exactly what I want to do. It is enough to make you believe that eventually you'll be able to code at the speed of thought.
Slider1.name: Kevin Whinnery

Slider2.feedback: After many recommendations, I finally switched from VSC to Cursor and ... wow! It's absolutely incredible. If you like Copilot (or if you don't), you'll be blown away by Cursor. There is no going back. ü§Ø
Slider2.name: Johannes Schickling
